article_title: “SNL” mocks Chris Christie for “draconian” Ebola quarantine policy
article_text:
Topics: Chris Christie, ebola, ebola quarantine, kaci hickox, Saturday Night Live, Video, Entertainment News, Politics News

“Saturday Night Live” mocked New Jersey Governor Chris Christie’s Ebola quarantine policy in last night’s cold open.

Christie (Bobby Moynihan) appeared on “The Kelly Files,” hosted by Megyn Kelly (Cecily Strong) to lampoon his Ebola policy — which the CDC called “draconian” — and discuss a potential run for president.

The following guest on “The Kelly Files” was nurse Kaci Hickox (Kate McKinnon). Hickox had some strong words (and punches) for Christie. Watch below:
